microframe.readers package
==========================

The `microframe.readers` subpackage includes modules for reading data into Microframe data structures.

readers module
--------------

This module provides the interfaces and base functionality for reading data.

.. automodule:: microframe.readers.readers
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Utilities
---------

The utilities submodules assist the main readers with format-specific tasks.

CSV Utilities
-------------

This module provides CSV-related utility functions.

.. automodule:: microframe.readers.utils.csv_utils
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
